languageSelector.title: Select Language
languageSelector.description: Choose your preferred language for the application.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Welcome back, here's your farm's overview.

diseaseDetectionPage.title: Crop Disease Detection
diseaseDetectionPage.description: Upload an image of a crop to identify potential diseases using AI.

diseaseDetector.uploadDescription: Choose a clear photo of the affected crop area.
diseaseDetector.analysisResultsDescription: Potential diseases identified by the AI model.
diseaseDetector.awaitingAnalysisDescription: Upload an image and click "Analyze" to see results here.
diseaseDetector.noDiseaseDescription: Our AI could not identify any specific diseases in the image. The crop appears to be healthy.
diseaseDetector.noImageToastDescription: Please upload an image to analyze.
diseaseDetector.analysisFailedToastDescription: Could not analyze the crop image. Please try again.

farmsPage.title: My Farms
farmsPage.description: Manage your farm profiles and get AI-powered crop suggestions.

farmManagement.recommendationsDescription: Based on your farm profile and market data for '{farmName}'.
farmManagement.noSuggestionsDescription: Select a farm and fill out its details, then click "Generate" to get recommendations.
farmManagement.errorToastDescription: Could not generate crop suggestions. Please try again.

marketWatchPage.title: Market Watch
marketWatchPage.description: Track real-time market prices and trends for key commodities.
marketWatchPage.pricesDescription: Live prices from agricultural markets. Click a row to see the trend.

settingsPage.title: Settings
settingsPage.description: Manage your account and application preferences.
